mapper.select: SELECT tl.id as id, tl.entity_id as entityId, tl.entity_name as entityName, tl.entity_field as entityField , CASE WHEN tl.reply_yn = 'Y' THEN true WHEN tl.reply_yn = 'N' THEN false END as replyYn , tl.persist_type as persistType, tl.old_value as oldValue, tl.new_value as newValue , tl.etc_value as etcValue, tl.attached_file_id as attachedFileId, tl.task_id as taskId, t.name as taskName, tl.project_id as projectId , tl.created_by as createdBy, tl.created_date as createdDate, tl.last_modified_by as lastModifiedBy, tl.last_modified_date as lastModifiedDate , u.profile_image_id as profileImageId, u.name as createdByName, u.id as createdById , af.id as attachedFileId, af.name as attachedFileName , af.size as attachedFileSize, af.content_type as attachedFileContentType FROM owl_trace_log tl LEFT OUTER JOIN owl_task t ON tl.task_id = t.id LEFT OUTER JOIN owl_trace_log_attached_file tlaf ON tlaf.trace_log_id = tl.id LEFT JOIN owl_attached_file af ON tlaf.attached_file_id = af.id LEFT JOIN owl_user u ON tl.created_by = u.login WHERE tl.entity_name = 'Task' AND tl.reply_yn = 'N' AND tl.task_id IN ( SELECT it.id FROM owl_task it WHERE (created_by = #{loginUser} OR EXISTS (SELECT tu.id FROM owl_task_user tu LEFT JOIN owl_user tiu ON tu.user_id = tiu.id WHERE tu.task_id = it.id AND tiu.login = #{loginUser} ) ) ) AND tl.created_date >= #{yesterday} ORDER BY tl.id DESC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
